participant_1.background:
I'm white, but I have a love for fighting that runs deep in my soul.
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
I've started to write short stories in my spare time.
i shop several times a week.
I think my pets are the best things in my life.

participant_2.background:
My dad was a cop and my wife just left me
i drive a fast sports car.
I like to read to my baby, so there's always a book in her nursery.
Since my new job is physically demanding, I try to go for a walk every day.
I cherish my Kesha concert ticket stub.

content.text: Not much, just got off work. How about you?
Doing good. I just finished writing a short story.
It's about a young woman who is trying to find her place in the world.
That sounds interesting. I hope she finds her place.
Me too. I'm not sure if she will or not, but I'm excited to find out.
What's your favorite part of writing?
I like the feeling of creating something new. It's like I'm giving birth to a new world.
That's a great way to put it. I've never thought of it like that before.
Yeah, it's really cool. I feel like I can do anything when I'm writing.
I wish I had that kind of creativity. I'm more of a numbers guy.
There's nothing wrong with that! Numbers are important too.
Thanks. I think I'm going to go for a walk now.
